entry.title: Googles Task is awesome
entry.summary:
Today I just login in my Gmail account and saw one small link below filters. This link is nothing but a Google one more feature.  Google chat integration in Gmail was one of the fabulous project.
Lets just talk about the "Task" the new feature will be very useful for a person like me :).  I have very weak memory so it will help me a lot.
Google's Task is also loaded with a drag an drop feature.

[caption id="attachment_55" align="aligncenter" width="241" caption="Drag and Drop"][/caption]

Lets see  what google will show up next.
